verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD רֹ֝עִ֗י <S%H7462><s%> ro-'I, [is] my shepherd לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not אֶחְסָֽר׃ <S%H2637><s%> 'ech-Sar. I shall not want

בִּנְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> bin-'ot pastures דֶּ֭שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> De-she in green יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי <S%H7257><s%> yar-bi-Tze-ni; He maketh me to lie down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside מֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> mei waters מְנֻח֣וֹת <S%H4496><s%> me-nu-Chot me beside the still יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5095><s%> ye-na-ha-Le-ni. he leadeth

נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב <S%H7725><s%> ye-sho-Vev; He restoreth יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי <S%H5148><s%> yan-Che-ni he leadeth בְמַעְגְּלֵי־ <S%H4570><s%> ve-ma'-ge-lei- me in the paths צֶ֝֗דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek, of righteousness לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an sake שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. for his name's

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Even כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- though אֵלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'e-Lech walk בְּגֵ֪יא <S%H1516><s%> be-Gei through the valley צַלְמָ֡וֶת <S%H6757><s%> tzal-Ma-vet of the shadow of death לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no אִ֘ירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> 'i-Ra I will fear רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', no evil כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- though אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di; me שִׁבְטְךָ֥ <S%H7626><s%> shiv-te-Cha for thou [art] with me thy rod וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ <S%H4938><s%> u-mish-'an-Te-cha, and thy staff הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> ye-Na-cha-Mu-ni. they comfort

תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ <S%H6186><s%> ta-'a-Roch Thou preparest לְפָנַ֨י׀ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before שֻׁלְחָ֗ן <S%H7979><s%> shul-Chan, a table נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged the presence צֹרְרָ֑י <S%H6887><s%> tzo-re-Rai; me in the presence of mine enemies דִּשַּׁ֖נְתָּ <S%H1878><s%> dish-Shan-ta thou anointest בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men with oil רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi, my head כּוֹסִ֥י <S%H3563><s%> ko-Si my cup רְוָיָֽה׃ <S%H7310><s%> re-va-Yah. runneth over

אַ֤ךְ׀ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely ט֤וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov Surely goodness וָחֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> va-Che-sed and mercy יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי <S%H7291><s%> Yir-de-fu-ni shall follow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei me all the days חַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai; of my life וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <S%H3427><s%> ve-shav-Ti and I will dwell בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> be-veit- in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> le-'O-rech forever יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. the days
